segments.text: May I order some cable from you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , what package would you like to order ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure of what packages you offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We offer packages with all the movie channels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We also have packages with all the sports channels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want a package that has the basic and movie channels .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to get that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like anything else with your package ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's it , but will I be able to add more channels at another time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can add or get rid of channels later on if you would like .
segments.speaker: S2
